subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Your fund worth $3.5M Usd has been approved to pay you.
Kindly forward your information stated below to enable our bank
process your ATM CARD Payment immediately.
Your Full Name:
Your Full Receiving Information:
Your Cell Phone Number:
A copy Of your ID:
Again our bank have only one mode of payment (1) ATM Card Payment: An
ATM Card Will Be Charged With This Amount with $5,000 Withdrawals Per
Day
Kindly forward the above listed information to enable our bank process
your ATM CARD payment here on your name with our any delay.
Yours faithfully,
Ali Y. KOÃ‡
Director
Yapi Kredi Bank Turkey

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Ali Y. KO,

Thank you for your email. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further. 

1) You mentioned that my fund worth USD has been approved, but the exact amount is not specified in the email. Could you please confirm the exact amount?

2) You asked me to forward some information, but it's not clear what specific information you need from me.

3) Lastly, could you provide more details about the ATM Card Payment process? How does it work and how can I ensure its safety and security?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Valerie
